name: Lucid
0:
”Alexa, what is the battery range of my Lucid?”
”Alexa, turn on remote climate in my Lucid”
”Alexa, set my car’s temp to 74”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Lucid skill for Amazon Alexa lets you control your Lucid Air using an Alexa-enabled device. After activating this skill and linking to your Lucid account in the Alexa app, you can ask Alexa to control key features, climate controls, check your remaining range, and more. (Note: Door unlock is not currently supported).

Simply say:
- "Alexa, what is the battery range of my Lucid?"
- "Alexa, what is the battery percent of my Lucid?"
- "Alexa, is my car locked?"
- "Alexa, turn on remote climate in my Lucid Air"
- "Alexa, set my car's climate to __ degrees"
- "Alexa, turn off the defrost in my Lucid"
